CustomField.description: A hidden field used to calculate the connectivity tool adoption for Accounts and AMs book of business.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A hidden field used to calculate the connectivity tool adoption for Accounts and AMs book of business. If date field filled in, then 1 is inserted into this field. If date field is blank, then 0 is interested to this field
CustomField.label: Outlook Plugin Last Used Date Count
